name: Cities and Names 4: Clarice's Plague
description:
Cities and Names 4: Clarice's Plague  is an adaptation of the chapter of the same name from Italo Calvino's Invisible Cities. You take control of a droid who has no memories of his purpose that desires to know why his fellow droids are attacking him, and what has happened to the city of Clarice.

You can download the Game Here!

Link to Download the Game
